docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Abuse and mistreatment of medical students are widespread and often leave long-lasting emotional scars that may affect their care of patients as physicians, new studies being published today show.

headline.main: Wide Abuse of Medical Students Found

docs.snippet: LEAD: Abuse and mistreatment of medical students are widespread and often leave long-lasting emotional scars that may affect their care of patients as physicians, new studies being published today show.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: JOURNAL OF THE AMERICAN MEDICAL ASSN

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Securities and Exchange Commission suspended trading today in the stock of the Bolar Pharmaceutical Company for the next 10 days. The move was in response to reports that the New York-based generic drug manufacturer had provided false test data to Government health officials about one of its products.
